cost_per_yalm.label: Cost Per Yalm
cost_per_yalm.tooltip: Penalty to fate score modifier, based on distance to fate.

time_to_teleport.label: Seconds To Teleport
time_to_teleport.tooltip: How many seconds it takes to teleport and load.

bonus_fate_modifier.label: Bonus FATE Modifier
bonus_fate_modifier.tooltip: Score bonus for fates with a bonus.

unstarted_fate_modifier.label: Unstarted Fate Modifier
unstarted_fate_modifier.tooltip: Score bonus for fates that haven't been started.

time_required_to_consider_fate.label: Seconds Required To Consider Fate
time_required_to_consider_fate.tooltip: How many seconds should be required in a fates estimated completion time, after an estimated arrival time.

in_progress_fate_modifier.label: In Progress Fate Modifier
in_progress_fate_modifier.tooltip:
Score bonus for fates that are already in progress but above the required seconds threshold.
This bonus is applied multiplicatively to the estimated time remaining after pathing to the fate.

ignore_mob_fates.label: Ignore Mob FATEs
ignore_mob_fates.tooltip: Ignore standard kill-type FATEs with many enemies.

mob_fate_modifier.label: Mob FATE Modifier
mob_fate_modifier.tooltip: Adjust the priority weight for mob-type FATEs.

ignore_boss_fates.label: Ignore Boss FATEs
ignore_boss_fates.tooltip: Ignore large boss-type FATEs with a single powerful enemy.

boss_fate_modifier.label: Boss FATE Modifier
boss_fate_modifier.tooltip: Adjust the priority weight for boss-type FATEs.

ignore_defend_fates.label: Ignore Defend FATEs
ignore_defend_fates.tooltip: Ignore FATEs where you must defend an NPC or location from waves of enemies.

defend_fate_modifier.label: Defend FATE Modifier
defend_fate_modifier.tooltip: Adjust the priority weight for defend-type FATEs.

ignore_escort_fates.label: Ignore Escort FATEs
ignore_escort_fates.tooltip: Ignore FATEs where you must escort an NPC safely to their destination.

escort_fate_modifier.label: Escort FATE Modifier
escort_fate_modifier.tooltip: Adjust the priority weight for escort-type FATEs.
